gloss: a unit of angular distance equal to 60 degrees / a unit of length (22 yards) / a unit of length equal to 220 yards / the back part of the human foot / the front part of the human leg between the knee and the ankle / the part of the human leg between the knee and the ankle
the part of the human leg between the knee and the ankle
a rule one meter long (usually marked off in centimeters and millimeters) / a unit of length (22 yards)
be in a state of movement or action
situated in or facing or moving toward or coming from the south
the part of a building above the ground floor
put down or press the foot, place the foot
firmly and solidly / stick to firmly / the basis on which something is grounded
a position of relative inferiority / be on the defensive; act against an attack / the state of being subject to danger or injury

move fast by using one's feet, with one foot off the ground at any given time / rearing on left hind leg with forelegs elevated and head usually in profile / use one's feet to advance; advance by steps
